OCD.name: Jakarta REST Resource Project Template with HTTP Whiteboard configuration
OCD.description: OSGi Technology Jakarta REST Whiteboard Resource with HTTP Whiteboard configuration project template

AD.name: HTTP Whiteboard Host
AD.description: The hostname where the HTTP Whiteboard will run on.

AD.name: HTTP Whiteboard Port
AD.description: The port the HTTP Whiteboard will run on.

AD.name: HTTP Whiteboard Name
AD.description: The name of the HTTP Whiteboard.

AD.name: HTTP Whiteboard Context-Path
AD.description: The context path, the HTTP Whiteboard will be available under.

AD.name: HTTP Whiteboards ID
AD.description: An ID for the HTTP Whiteboard. Whitespaces should be avoided here!

AD.name: Jakarta REST Whiteboard Name
AD.description: The name of the Jakarta REST Whiteboard.

AD.name: Jakarta REST Whiteboard Context-Path
AD.description: The context path the REST application will be available under. It is the segment after the HTTP Whiteboard context-path.

AD.name: JakartaRs Whiteboards ID
AD.description: An ID for the Jakarta REST Whiteboard. Whitespaces should be avoided here!
